title: 快捷指令插件怎么给玩家权限

replies.author: a13870136617
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp builder chestcommands.command.open
权限帮你找到了
求最佳答案

replies.author: craft玩家
replies.txt_content:
/mangaddp 权限组 权限
默认权限组一般为：builder或者default

replies.author: craft玩家
replies.txt_content:
craft玩家 发表于 2014-8-30 12:58
/mangaddp 权限组 权限
默认权限组一般为：builder或者default
至于权限是什么请去原贴查找
